item.title: Invisable work
item.description: Eurostat data: tus_00age - Time spent, participation time and participation rate in the main activity by sex and age group Metadata library(eurostat) ## Warning: Paket 'eurostat' wurde unter R Version 3.6.1 erstellt library(data.table) library(magrittr) library(ggplot2) ## Registered S3 methods overwritten by 'ggplot2': ## method from ## [.quosures rlang ## c.quosures rlang ## print.quosures rlang library(ggthemes) library(stringr) library(knitr) id <- "tus_00age" dat <- get_eurostat(id, time_format ="num", select_time="Y") ## Table tus_00age cached at C:\Users\joku\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpKy66VP/eurostat/tus_00age_num_codeY_TF.
